# authorizationStateForPlatformCredentials

**Instance Property**

Returns a value that indicates whether the browser app has access to a person’s passkeys.

## Declaration

```swift
var authorizationStateForPlatformCredentials: ASAuthorizationWebBrowserPublicKeyCredentialManager.AuthorizationState { get }
```

## Requesting access to passkeys

- **requestAuthorizationForPublicKeyCredentials(_:)**: Requests a person’s permission to use their passkeys.
- **ASAuthorizationWebBrowserPublicKeyCredentialManager.AuthorizationState**: An enumeration of values that indicate whether the browser app has access to a person’s passkeys.

items.description: Requests a person’s permission to use their passkeys.
